Request Item Number: ${number}

Dear ${current.variable_pool.requester_first_name},

The request for ${current.variables.shr_form_name} that you have submitted for ${current.variable_pool.employee_name} has failed to pass through your unit approval process.

Please consult with the appropriate individuals to determine the reason of this rejection. If you take corrective steps for this request, a new submission will be required.

Thank you,

Staff Human Resources
